Text:
Hello!
I would like to thank U very very much for Bava's and Rollin's posts on TPB.

Please, keep 'em coming more :)

Cheer! :)
I dont have any more Rollin movies and not Bava's The Ogre. I am going to upload Demons & Demons 2 by Bava soon. They are true classics : )

hey classiccultflicks, how's it going?  It's great to see someone new picking up the mantle that me, Garbo, Mondo, and others have left behind and offering great classics up on a public tracker, 

and we keep hearing that PirateBay is done for good, but it lives on, 

a lot of people put this film down but I love it
it's a lot of fun just have to be in the right mood,
